This episode I touch on the frustrating aspect of XPS foam dungeons tiles...the fact that they are so light and smooth that they slide around easily. This can really disrupt your game and make you annoyed while running a game of Dungeons and Dragons. You really don't need this distraction as a dungeon master. I'll discuss various options, and show my solution, for solving this annoying problem.
